WorkItem.Description: No matter which pet you choose for warlock, pet dps is 0, and also when trying to look at events prediction about your combat, it gives empty screen after double-clicking.

Comments.Message:
Pets are not modeled in the current version of Warlock, hence the 0 DPS.
I added that events prediction when I was working on Lock to work out the problems with Haste I was having, it was never really meant to be an actual feature :)
Currently it's not used anymore and as far as I know there are no plans to bring it back as the model just works differently now (more like a modelas it should be, less like a simulation).
